title: Only Sense Online (LN) - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Gender Bender   Sci-fi   Shounen   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Manga   Alchemy   Androgynous Characters   Appearance Changes   Archery   Beast Companions   Cooking   Crafting   Curses   Fairies   Farming   Friendship   Grinding   Herbalist   Male to Female   Merchants   MMORPG   Monsters   Pill Concocting   Summoning Magic   Sword And Magic   Virtual Reality
author: Aloha Zachou   アロハ 座長
description: Yun is a novice MMO player who equipped only unpopular skills labelled as garbage. However, soon after the official launch of the game, the NPCs stopped selling Recovery Potions. Everyone finally started to notice the importance of Support Magic and Items. And that spells trouble for Yun as well as all the other support-based players. They received orders for recovery potion from endless flood of players en masse, some more aggressive players even go as far as forcing the support players to be their personal craftsman. In order to prevent this from going out of hands, all the support players grouped together to form a community to keep things in order.>
